Source code for peachbox.model.types

from pyspark.sql.types import *



[docs]class Types(object):

    spark_types = {'StringType':StringType,
                   'IntegerType':IntegerType}

    python_types = {'StringType':unicode,
                    'IntegerType':int}

    @staticmethod

[docs]    def spark_type(peachbox_type):
        return Types.spark_types[peachbox_type]()


    @staticmethod

[docs]    def python_type(peachbox_type):
        return Types.python_types[peachbox_type]
